ComicInfo.Summary:
Banished from The Marked, Liza is recruited by the governmentâ€™s occult research department, Shadowgate, where she is encouraged to take her magic to the limits and beyond. The Marked must find her before she succeeds in creating an unstoppable army of super-soldiers.
